article.title: SconeServer
article.description: The SconeServer kernel, or root module.

content.p: The sconeserver module is the root of the module tree, and is always present when SconeServer is running. Its main task is to manage the simultaneous handling of client connections, dispatching events to the relevant modules where appropriate.
